name: Few Seconds To Die
description:
FSTD is a fast-paced action platform game where the main goal is to get to the finish line as quickly as possible before the timer runs out.

Flying drones, police robots, exploding bomb-robots with...small legs? All of them will prevent you from achieving your goal.

The game has 3 types of opponents and 3 types of weapons, which include 3 additional modules each.

Inspired by Neon White, Celaria and Quake Defrag Mod.

* * *

Made in Dubna University Game Jam for 10 days.

* * *

How to play:

- WASD - Movement

- Mouse - Look around

- Space - Jump

- LMB - Shoot

- RMB - Second Fire

- F - Restart level

- 1, 2, 3 - Weapon Slots
